attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I wanted to support the president but then I remembered I wasn’t a orange who is racist so not a good app don’t get unless u gonna rate it 1 star since he wants to take our TikTok away we will take a way his app

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Yea this was one of the worst “ news” apps ever. None of the info was fact checked at all. A lot of the info can be disproven with a simple google search

attributes.title: RUDE!!!
attributes.review: I got this app to fully support my lovely president the orange Cheeto puff but the app had sent very disturbing messages to my grandpa and he pushed my cat down the stairs. This is a horrible app and my goldfish does not approve of what the app did to my dog.

attributes.title: ✨No✨
attributes.review: I waited a week for this app to download, all in favor for our holy 🍊 orange 🍊 ... but it kept glitching and saying things like “eat my 🍑”  and “lick my 🍆” 😔 very disappointed in the performance of this app :/

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I thought this app would be good for following politics and staying informed but when I opened the app all I saw was a Cheeto puff shooting Cheeto dust at me. This app is so bad that a one star review just isn’t low enough.

attributes.title: Trump app crashes a
attributes.review: Developers are really failing the app constantly crashes and it appears to be ministering data seem like trump is part of the deep government with the data he’s taking witht this pp

attributes.title: Kept on Crashing
attributes.review: This is absolutely an horrible app. It locked me out my phone for 3 hours until I can get back into it.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: When i had decided to download this app I thought it would show me things that trump had planned but no this app is terrible😔I do not support this orange what so ever and idk why people do🤢

attributes.title: Disgraceful app
attributes.review: Literally just horrible. App doesn’t work, extremely confusing, always asking for money, strange approach to polices. Just don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: App
attributes.review: This app I thought I could use to connect and know my president donald trump. All it did was spam false information. Instigated fights in my family and continued to crash. Not a fan
